item.description:
Lets bike from Scituate Harbor Gazebo (Behind Riva Restaurant @ 116 Front Street), through Cohasset Harbor to Hull Gut then back.

This is a 30 mile round trip through some of the the most scenic waterfront we've got. This ride has 1 or 2 short climbs, but they are worth it.

This shouldn't be your first ride of the season.

You should bring plenty of water or gatorade as well as some energy bars.

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Lets go to Hull and back........
